channel.title: 667 Mining!
channel.description:
Hey, so I'm trying to add custom mining on my 667 source.
What I've done so far is: Make it so you only get one ore each time you mine it. I slowed down the time it takes to get an ore, modified the level requirements, and modified the XP per ore mined, etc.
What I need to do, is stop the rocks from disappearing after I mine an ore. For some reason, the rock disappears as soon as I get the first ore.
This is part of the code in mining.java. It should be all that's needed to fix it, but I'm not sure.
[code] Copper_Ore(1, 10, 436, 10, 10, 14906, 0, 1), Tin_Ore(1, 10, 438, 10, 10, 14902, 0, 1), Iron_Ore(15, 15, 440, 10, 10, 14856, 0, 1), Coal_Ore(30, 25, 453, 10, 10, 14850, 0, 1), Gold_Ore(40, 32, 444, 10, 10, 2098, 0, 1), Mithril_Ore(55, 40, 447, 10, 10, 14853, 0, 1), Adamant_Ore(70, 45, 449, 10, 10, 14862, 0, 1), Runite_Ore(85, 50, 451, 20, 20, 14859, 0, 1);[/code]
If you need to know what any of those numbers mean to help me out, or you need any other part of the code in order to help, let me know. :)
Thanks!

item.title: 667 Mining!
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

Hey, so I’m trying to add custom mining on my 667 source.

What I’ve done so far is:
Make it so you only get one ore each time you mine it. I slowed down the time it takes to get an ore, modified the level requirements, and modified the XP per ore mined, etc.

What I need to do, is stop the rocks from disappearing after I mine an ore. For some reason, the rock disappears as soon as I get the first ore.

This is part of the code in mining.java. It should be all that’s needed to fix it, but I’m not sure.

Copper_Ore(1, 10, 436, 10, 10, 14906, 0, 1), Tin_Ore(1, 10, 438, 10, 10, 14902, 0, 1), Iron_Ore(15, 15, 440, 10, 10, 14856, 0, 1), Coal_Ore(30, 25, 453, 10, 10, 14850, 0, 1), Gold_Ore(40, 32, 444, 10, 10, 2098, 0, 1), Mithril_Ore(55, 40, 447, 10, 10, 14853, 0, 1), Adamant_Ore(70, 45, 449, 10, 10, 14862, 0, 1), Runite_Ore(85, 50, 451, 20, 20, 14859, 0, 1);

If you need to know what any of those numbers mean to help me out, or you need any other part of the code in order to help, let me know.

Thanks!
